init

public void init(Map parent)
if the parent is set durign the construction of this object, then it is automaticly initialised, but if it isnt it will have to be set here, or the maptile will never be drawn!!!

parent -

public GameEntity getEntity()
Gets the current GameEntity standing on this tile. Be aware that this can be null!!!

the entity that is currently standing on the tile or null
